comments: He\'s a pretty dope professor. Cracks jokes from time to time and means well. He has the assignments clearly laid out and he lets you know about assignments well ahead. Managerial Accounting is kinda tough but he makes it easy. Solid professor.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Clear grading criteria (4)  Caring (3)  Respected (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Inspirational (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  EXTRA CREDIT  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
comments: Accounting at 8am is pretty dull and Prof Muccino\'s temperament doesn\'t change that, but he lays out clear expectations and assignments, makes sure you\'re well prepared for exams, is always available to help outside of class, makes effective use of Blackboard, and gives lots of extra credit. Take him if you have the opportunity!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Clear grading criteria (4)  Caring (3)  Respected (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Inspirational (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: This was a pretty good class! He is super funny and everything is laid out perfectly so you know what is due and when. Only problem was that I found that the homework was super easy and the tests were worded differently and seemed to ask something different? It was a pretty great class though, very friendly, always willing to help, great professor.

comments: Another down to Earth professor. I suck at mathematics and anything related, and he wasn\'t originally this into accounting either. So he\'s able to simplify everything for a student like me that\'s not in the field of accounting. Very sociable. Exams, quizzes, and online homework clearly come from the lectures. Each exam has a take home portion.
